thread.title: Pictures: The New Haven Bed Race

author: courant.com
title: Pictures: The New Haven Bed Race
text:
Caption The New Haven Bed Race Sean Fowler, Special to The Courant Sean Fowler, Special to The Courant The New Haven Bed Race Sean Fowler, Special to The Courant Sean Fowler, Special to The Courant See more galleries The New Haven Bed Race made its triumphant return to the streets of New Haven for the first time since 1990. The event started with a parade of the themed beds followed by the bed race which had several elimination rounds. Click here for video from the races .
Sean Fowler, Special to the Courant
